last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: A young couple expecting a child moves into the house. To get answers, Yasuo, Haruka and Michiko all pay a visit to the cursed home.

name: Ju-On: Origins
overview: A paranormal researcher searches obsessively for a cursed home where something terrible happened to a mother and her child long ago.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A paranormal researcher searches obsessively for a cursed home where something terrible happened to a mother and her child long ago.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A young actress is troubled by mysterious footsteps in her apartment. Intrigued, paranormal researcher Yasuo asks her to record the sounds.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Things change for Kiyomi and her attackers after the incident at the abandoned house. Tetsuya's psychic mother reaches out to Haruka.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Kiyomi is now a mother, but her hard life takes a turn for the worse. Through it all, she continues to have visions of the woman in white.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: His obsessive search for the cursed house leads Yasuo to "M," an incarcerated child killer. A pregnant woman incurs her husband's wrath.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Yasuo realizes that he has a deep connection to the cursed house. After seeing her in a vision, he goes out in search of Kiyomi.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A young couple expecting a child moves into the house. To get answers, Yasuo, Haruka and Michiko all pay a visit to the cursed home.
